ControllerLinks.description: This is the complex property is for the additional OEM Links realted to the DMTF NetworkAdapter Controller.
ControllerLinks.longDescription: This is the complex property is for the additional OEM Links realted to the DMTF NetworkAdapter Controller.

DellNetworkAdapter.description: This property shall represent the Oem properties for a NetworkAdapter resource.
DellNetworkAdapter.longDescription: This property shall represent the Oem properties for a NetworkAdapter resource.

ExportTriggerLog.description: This action exports the trigger log to a specified server
ExportTriggerLog.longDescription: This action exports the trigger log to a specified server using the provided credentials and share information

SetPowerSavingMode.description: This action is used to set the PowerSavingMode for a NetworkAdapter.
SetPowerSavingMode.longDescription: This action is used to set the PowerSavingMode for a NetworkAdapter. It enables or disables the power save mode on the NetworkAdapter.

title: #DellNetworkAdapter
